name: Dungeons of Divination
description:
Dungeons of Divination is a no-DM competitive or solo TTRPG dungeon crawl for 1-6 players utilizing a deck of tarot cards and a set of dice. Players explore a randomly generated dungeon: rooms containing both dangerous foes and valuable treasures are represented by the 22 major arcana cards placed face-down and arranged to form a grid based board. Character equipment is represented by a hand of cards from the 56 minor arcana. Turn-based combat is powered by familiar dice rolling goodness. The first player to collect 100 gold and exit the dungeon wins!

Made for One-Page RPG Jam 2021.
